Package memory_game_client.view

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BoardPanel
    This panel contains all the visual components of the game board and cards.
    It also contains the logic for generating card pairs in single player mode (card pairs are generated on the server side in multiplayer mode), checking whether opened pair is a match and updating the score on the score board via Controller.
    GameFrame
    Main game frame.
    GameModeFrame
    Game mode frame - offers the client the choice between Single player and multiplayer mode.
    Also contains the text input field for multiplayer server's IP address.
    HighScoresFrame
    Displays high scores of all the users.
    MenuPanel
    Menu panel which is located in top left corner of the main window.
    MyScoresFrame
    Displays scores of the current user.
    ScorePanel
    Displays score(s) for the player(s) and information about game outcome.
